description:
The Straw Hats somehow manage to defeat the Foxy Pirates and win back Chopper, but Luffy eagerly accepts the challenge of a rematch! What is the captain thinking? And will his crew mutiny?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Due nuove sfide per Rubber e la sua ciurma
Un service fulgurant. Balle au prisonnier version pirate
الكرات المشتعلة القاصفة الصّارخة! كرة مراوغة القراصنة!
ดวลบอลเดือด! ดอดจ์บอลโจรสลัด!
うなる熱球剛球! 海賊ドッジボール!
